description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Historical Researches on the wars and sports of the Mongols and Romans: in which elephants and wild beasts were employed or slain, and the remarkable local agreement of history with the remains of such animals found in Europe and Siberia ... With a map and ten plates" Author: RANKING, John. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 583.i.25.", "British Library HMNTS 800.cc.16."
